content:
We have prepared dispositions for most of the comments submitted on the CQL ballot. The working spreadsheet is available for review here:

https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1My9relWVjxe-wZukqfqYI0_XDNsIXgKyJHKrJM_9B2A/edit?usp=sharing

We are finalizing a proposed block vote with all the items marked FutureCall, and will be discussing the items marked NextCall beginning on the CDS WG call this Wednesday.
